description: List job production plan safety risks suggestions.
permissions: Access is delegated to the related job production plan. A user may list suggestions if they can access the associated job production plan per JobProductionPlanPolicy (e.g., admin; customer manager/operations with visibility; broker member; assigned planner/project manager; time card approver or subscriber; or assigned laborer/notifying crew).

flags.name: --job-production-plan
flags.description: Filter by job production plan ID
